newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco seizes 2.4 tonnes of cannabis.
newsitem.headline: Morocco seizes 2.4 tonnes of cannabis.

text.p: Morocco said on Tuesday it had seized more than 2.4 tonnes of cannabis in separate raids in the northern city of Nador.

In a statement carried by the official news agency MAP, the interior ministry said its anti-narcotics squads had discovered last week respectively 1.1 tonnes on a fishing vessel and other amounts hidden in two cars.
A third haul of 235 kg packed in bundles was found in the central city of Fez in a wheat field.
